p: The presence of water content and oxygen in the insulating oils at high temperature causes its oxidation, which leads to its ageing and consequently to the degradation of the characteristics of this liquid [ 7, 11]. The influence of the degree of the insulating oil ageing on the phenomenon of initiation and development of electro convection and especially on the variation of the breakdown voltage of the insulating liquid attracts the attention of several researchers [ 2, 7, 9, 11, 15].
